description:
Opportunities like this rarely come to market! Situated only minutes from Nerang State High School and the M1 motorway, this conveniently located residence is positioned on an expansive 847sqm block and just waiting for you to enjoy all it has to offer. Whether you are a first home buyer, investor, larger family or multigenerational household, this property will appeal to all as it features an extremely flexible floorplan with endless options, offering the pinnacle of contemporary living.

Entering the property upstairs, you are immediately greeted by the expansive main living and dining area with the updated kitchen showcasing an oversized island with stone benchtop, modern appliances and plenty of storage space, which is sure to impress even the toughest of critics. There are also 3 spacious bedrooms, all with ceiling fans, and a well-appointed main bathroom with separate powder room. However, what truly makes this home unique is the endless opportunities afforded downstairs, with the lower level featuring an open plan living area, fully-functional kitchen, utility room that is currently utilised as a bedroom and a recently renovated bathroom with dual access. There is also a garage conversion that is being used for additional living space and features a kitchenette, ensuite and private patio area with separate access, further adding to the incredible value that is on offer.

Externally, your outdoor entertaining options are well catered for with the sprawling, undercover alfresco area and large pool house both creating the perfect place to unwind or entertain, and providing direct supervision over the stunning, in-ground pool. There is also a free-standing annex that is currently utilised as an office and storage space, further highlighting just how rare this opportunity is and must be inspected to appreciate.

Featuring:
• 3 spacious bedrooms, all with ceiling fans
• A well-appointed main bathroom with separate powder
• Expansive main living and dining area
• Updated kitchen showcasing an oversized island with stone benchtop, modern appliances and plenty of storage space
• Lower level featuring an open plan living area, fully-functional kitchen, utility room that is currently utilised as a bedroom and a recently renovated bathroom with dual access
• Garage conversion that is being used for additional living space with a kitchenette, ensuite, private patio area and separate access
• Sprawling, undercover alfresco area with direct supervision over the stunning, in-ground pool
• Large pool house
• Free-standing annex currently utilised as an office and storage space
• 4.5 x 3m shed
• 2 x 6.5kW solar systems
• Split-system air-conditioning throughout
• Fully fenced boundary, offering privacy and security
• Side access
• Cubby House
• 7.5 x 2.5m undercover storage
• Expansive 847sqm block only minutes from Nerang State High School and the M1 motorway
• Double carport
• Abundance of available yard space
• Much more!

The position of this property only adds to the value, and the lucky new owners will find themselves only minutes away from everything they need, including schools, shopping, amenities, as well as rapid access to the M1 motorway. So, if you're looking for the perfect family home that ticks all of the boxes, then contact Ryan McLennan or Danny Jenkins today to secure your private inspection.

DISCLAIMER: We have in preparing this advertisement used our best endeavours to ensure the information contained is true and accurate; however, we accept no responsibility and disclaim all liability in respect to any errors, omissions, inaccuracies or misstatements contained. Prospective purchasers should make their own enquiries to verify the information contained in this advertisement.
